name: Therapeutic Swim
description: This program is designed to provide aquatic exercise and recreation time for individuals recovering from illness or injury, or who would benefit from movement in a warm water environment.
fullDescription: This program is designed to provide aquatic exercise and recreation time for individuals recovering from illness or injury, or who would benefit from movement in a warm water environment.
whatTheyOffer: This program is designed to provide aquatic exercise and recreation time for individuals recovering from illness or injury, or who would benefit from movement in a warm water environment.
howToGetIt: Please fill out the following application and return to the pool front desk or email it to aquatics@prrcsf.org https://static1.squarespace.com/static/63c9e0bf941224684f3b900d/t/6407dea835a257523da9c0c6/1678237352564/t.s.+packet+03.2023.pdf
cost: Varies depending on type of swimming events: https://www.prrcsf.org/therapeutic-swim
